name: Zombie Killer - Type to Shoot!
description: This game is a typing game, not a shooting game. Type in a word or sentence in the chest of a zombie and defeat it. Get a high score and show off your typing skills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Celeron Series Memory: 3072 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4600 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
